channel.title: Trek on Sci-fi Books Club
channel.description: Recent content in Trek on Sci-fi Books Club

item.title: Picard: Second Self by Una McCormack book review
item.description:
Following on from the success of her season 1 prequel novel, The Last Best Hope, author Una McCormack returns to the world of Picard with Second Self â€” a new novel set between seasons 1 & 2 of the TV show. After several delays the novel has finally seen the light of day. So, was it worth the wait?

Spoilers ahead!
